messages.content: You are a security expert with a focus on software vulnerabilities. Analyze the following code snippet and identify any potential vulnerabilities, and respond with three lines. Line 1: an integer indicating the type of vulnerability {'None': 0, 'SQL Injection': 1, 'XSS': 2, 'Command Injection': 3}, an array of integer(s) indicating line number of source location(s), an array of integer(s) indicating sink location(s)
